title: Ahh, the comfortable life... Res Lease in Austin. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Check out this modern 2-story home with 3 bedrooms, and 2.5 baths in East Austin waiting for you to lease!!
This home features elegant and easy-to-clean concrete flooring, high ceilings, and modern touches throughout.
The well-designed kitchen boasts ample pantry space, stylish white cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances perfect for creating some delicious meals!!

The primary bedroom has ample room and big windows that allow in tons of natural light, it also features an ensuite bathroom with double vanity and a nice large shower waiting for you to relax in after a long day at work.
The privately fenced backyard is perfect for gardening or relaxing with its beautiful green lawn.
Schedule your tour and apply for this home today!
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package.
** lawn maintenance included in the rent
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC
